attributes.action: Make 'Crash for Cash' scamming an official criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So-called 'crash for cash' scams are a growing crime. I feel as a proper deterrent it should be made into an official criminal offence. It should carry a maximum 10 year prison sentence and compulsory life driving ban. Also offenders should be barred from obtaining car insurance for life
